timeline.bodyText: This was a request from @dlukeomalley so we can further distinguish something like ERROR from something like ParseError. It will now look like severity:error.
timeline.author: mschwager
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -74,7 +74,7 @@ def build_normal_output(
         current_file = rule_match.path
         check_id = rule_match.id
         message = rule_match.message
-        severity = rule_match.severity
+        severity = rule_match.severity.lower()
